ecosim

Class Fasta

  • java.lang.Object
    • ecosim.Fasta

  • public class Fasta
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the input and output of Fasta formatted text files.
    Author:
    Jason Wood

        public Fasta(Fasta fasta,
     java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> selectedIds)
        Constructor for a Fasta object, used for making a copy of a Fasta object, using only the selected IDs.
        Parameters:
        fasta - The Fasta object that contains the data for this new Fasta object.
        selectedIds - The IDs to keep in this new Fasta.
